summary: BRAKING EFFECTIVENESS IS SIGNIFICANTLY REDUCED UNEXPECTEDLY / RANDOMLY. DEALER COULD NOT REPRODUCE THE PROBLEM SO NO FIX WAS DONE. THERE WAS A HYUNDAI RECALL, #114, WHICH REQUIRED THE CHANGING OF THE BREAK FLUID DUE TO CORROSION OF THE HECU. THIS WAS PERFORMED IN 2014 BUT APPARENTLY THIS HAS NOT SOLVED THE PROBLEM. THE VEHICLE IS NOW UNSAFE TO DRIVE.
